name: Up your frames !
description:
This game was made for the Tri Jam 29 and was succesfully developped in only 3 hours ! It is hardcoded in JavaScript with the help of the p5.js library. 

Your goal : train your computer to reboot it's frame rate FAST  

Gameplay : you have to bring parts to repair your clicking robot at the same time as developing the best strategy by choosing your upgrades carefully: 1 increase your AI speed 2 increase the amount of robots parts he can cary ( capacity ) 3 increase the spawn rate of robots parts. 

Every time your robot clicks , a frame is created ;)

Controls: arrow keys

Thanks again to p5.js for their awesome library
